abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column compares mobile apps that offer options for those trying to sift through Internet to find best content to read and share with others; recommends IA writer as one of best writing applications available on Android operating systems.
lead_paragraph: StumbleUpon, Soundwave and the popular Pinterest help users find articles, videos, images or music, and share it with others.

headline.main: Video Feature: Pointing the Way to Good Reads, Videos and Music
headline.print_headline: Pointing the Way to Good Reads, Videos and Music

snippet: StumbleUpon, Soundwave and the popular Pinterest help users find articles, videos, images or music, and share it with others.
